vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἡλεί (Rec. Ἡλί; RV, Ἡλί), ὁ, indecl.,
Heli, Joseph's father: Luk.3:23.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Luk.3.23;
son of: Matthat (G3158);
father of: Mary (G3137)
§ Heli, "ascent [to God]"
Heli the father of Joseph, Lk. 3:23*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希里 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "上升"
馬利亞的丈夫約瑟的父親(路 3:23)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
希里 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "上升"
马利亚的丈夫约瑟的父亲(路 3:23)
